Lyric:
[by:厉弦]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:]
[00:30.92]Join me I deserved it
[00:33.36]No time to have you lurking
[00:35.64]If I got right then you might like it
[00:38.00]You know I dealt with you the nicest
[00:40.52]Nobody touch me, I’m the righteous
[00:42.68]Nobody text me in a crisis
[00:44.80]I believed all of your dreams are fruition
[00:47.04]You took my heart and my keys and my vision
[00:49.44]You took my heart off my sleeve a decoration
[00:51.76]You mistaken my love I brought for you for foundation
[00:54.36]All that I wanted from you was to give me something that I never had
[00:59.52]Something that you've never seen
[01:01.96]Something that you've never been
[01:06.24]But I wake up and everything's wrong
[01:08.48]Just get ready for work, work, work, work, work, work
[01:11.00]You see me I be work, work, work, work, work, work
[01:13.36]You see me do me dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt
[01:15.72]For some of that work, work, work, work, work, work
[01:18.84]Duh, duh, duh, duh, duh, duh
[01:20.52]For you I got love, love, love, love, love, love
[01:22.84]When I came for my turn, turn, turn, turn, turn, turn
[01:49.20]Yeah, okay, you need to get done, done, done, done
[01:53.48]That’ll work, come over
[01:55.36]We just need to slow the motion
[01:57.76]Don't give that away to no one
[01:59.76]Long distance, I need you
[02:02.00]When I see potential I just gotta see it through
[02:04.36]If you had a twin I would still choose you
[02:06.76]I don't wanna rush into it, if it's too soon
[02:09.16]But I know you need to get done, done, done, done
[02:12.84]If you come over
[02:14.52]Sorry if I'm way less friendly
[02:16.76]I got niggas tryna end me
[02:18.92]Oh, yeah, I spilled all my emotions tonight, I'm sorry
[02:23.56]Rolling, rolling, rolling, rolling, rolling
[02:26.00]How many more shots until you're rolling?
[02:28.92]We just need a face to face
[02:31.44]You could pick the time and the place
[02:33.60]You spent some time away
[02:36.16]Now you need to forward and give me all the
[02:38.08]Work, work, work, work, work, work
[02:39.84]You see me I be work, work, work, work, work, work
[02:42.20]You see me do me dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt, dirt
[02:44.56]For some of that work, work, work, work, work, work
[02:47.56]Duh, duh, duh, duh, duh, duh
[02:49.32]For you I got love, love, love, love, love, love
[02:51.64]When I came for my turn, turn, turn, turn, turn, turn
